root.title: “Darvi” rock inscriptions, The
root.place: The inscriptions found on rocks of district «Bayshin uzuuryin zhurgeryin tsagaan tolgoy» on Shar Bulag mountain of Darvi sum of Khovd aimag of Mongolia.
root.general: The rock is kind of clusters of stones of light grey granite.
root.description: There are 5 lines of inscriptions in different places of the rock. There are also 24 signs.
root.size: Height of the inscriptions is 5 cm in average.
root.investigation: Mongolian archeologist H.Perlee found in 1959. B.Rintchen published a picture 262 in 1968. S.G.Klyashtornyi, H.Luvsanbaldan, M.Shinehuu, the members of Soviet-Mongolian joint expedition conducted researches in 1969 and 1970. Study of the inscriptions was published by M.Shinehuu on the basis of his own manual copies 263.
root.details: Н.Базылхан "Көне түрік бітіктастары мен ескерткіштері (Орхон, Ениесей, Талас)" //"Қазақстан тарихы түркі тілді деректемелерде" атты сериясы бойынша. II том. - Алматы: Дайк-пресс, 2005. - Б.166.
